languages.text: {n}Арджента закусывает губу.{/n} "Вы подозреваете меня в недостойных порывах. Но я приму этот упрек и постараюсь поразмыслить о нем. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сестры{/g} знают, что такое смирение..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента закусывает губу.{/n} "Вы подозреваете меня в недостойных порывах. Но я приму этот упрек и постараюсь поразмыслить о нем. Сестры знают, что такое смирение..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta bites her lip.{/n} "You suspect me of unworthy urges. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters{/g} know the meaning of humility..."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента закусывает губу.{/n} "Вы подозреваете меня в недостойных порывах. Но я приму этот упрек и постараюсь поразмыслить о нем. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сестры{/g} знают, что такое смирение..."

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔咬住了嘴唇。{/n}“你怀疑我被卑劣的动机所驱使，不过我愿意接受你的责备，尽我所能地思考。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女{/g}懂得谦卑的含义……”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta bites her lip.{/n} "You suspect me of unworthy urges. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters{/g} know the meaning of humility..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔咬住了嘴唇。{/n}“你怀疑我被卑劣的动机所驱使，不过我愿意接受你的责备，尽我所能地思考。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女{/g}懂得谦卑的含义……”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta se muerde el labio.{/n} «Sospecha que albergo ansias indignas. Aceptaré el reproche y lo meditaré. Las {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}hermanas{/g} conocen el sentido de la humildad...».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta bites her lip.{/n} "You suspect me of unworthy urges. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters{/g} know the meaning of humility..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta se muerde el labio.{/n} «Sospecha que albergo ansias indignas. Aceptaré el reproche y lo meditaré. Las {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}hermanas{/g} conocen el sentido de la humildad...».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは唇を噛む。{/n}「陛下は我を不相応な衝動で疑っておられる。だが、我はこの非難を受け入れ、最善を尽くして考えてみようと思います。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}シスター{/g}は謙遜という言葉を知っているものですから…」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta bites her lip.{/n} "You suspect me of unworthy urges. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters{/g} know the meaning of humility..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは唇を噛む。{/n}「陛下は我を不相応な衝動で疑っておられる。だが、我はこの非難を受け入れ、最善を尽くして考えてみようと思います。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}シスター{/g}は謙遜という言葉を知っているものですから…」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta beißt sich auf die Lippen.{/n} "Ihr verdächtigt mich unwürdiger Beweggründe. Aber ich werde diesen Vorwurf akzeptieren und versuchen, darüber nachzudenken. Die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Schwestern{/g} wissen, was Demut bedeutet ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta bites her lip.{/n} "You suspect me of unworthy urges. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters{/g} know the meaning of humility..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta beißt sich auf die Lippen.{/n} "Ihr verdächtigt mich unwürdiger Beweggründe. Aber ich werde diesen Vorwurf akzeptieren und versuchen, darüber nachzudenken. Die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Schwestern{/g} wissen, was Demut bedeutet ..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta se mord la lèvre.{/n} « Vous m'imputez des désirs indignes... mais j'accepte ce reproche et je tâcherai de méditer à son sujet. Les {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sœurs{/g} connaissent la signification de l'humilité. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta bites her lip.{/n} "You suspect me of unworthy urges. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters{/g} know the meaning of humility..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta se mord la lèvre.{/n} « Vous m'imputez des désirs indignes... mais j'accepte ce reproche et je tâcherai de méditer à son sujet. Les {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sœurs{/g} connaissent la signification de l'humilité. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta dudağını ısırıyor.{/n} "Beni, alçak dürtülerle hareket etmekle itham ediyorsun. Bu kınamayı kabullenip değerlendireceğim. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Rahibeler{/g}, tevazunun ehemmiyetinin farkındadır."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta bites her lip.{/n} "You suspect me of unworthy urges. But I will accept this reproach and try my best to think on it. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisters{/g} know the meaning of humility..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta dudağını ısırıyor.{/n} "Beni, alçak dürtülerle hareket etmekle itham ediyorsun. Ancak bu kınamayı kabullenip değerlendireceğim. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Rahibe{/g}ler tevazunun ehemmiyetinin farkındadır."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
